subject: Sun Trust Bank INC.
body:
Sun Trust Bank INC.
5361 Us Highway 158,
Advance, NC U.S.A
Dear Beneficiary
I am Mr Mark Wegener the managing director of (Truist Bank NC),set up
to fight against scam and fraudulent activities worldwide. This group
is responsible for investigating the legitimacy of unpaid contract,
inheritance and lotto winning claims by  companies and
individuals and directs the paying authorities (banks) worldwide to
make immediate payment of verified claims to the beneficiaries without
further delay.the world bank group has mandated that your fund should
be release immediately the sum of $11.8usd (eleven million, eight
hundred thousand united states dollars has been approved in your favor
via my desk.
You are being legally contacted regarding the release of your long
awaited fund. After a detailed review of your file, the world bank
group has mandated that your fund should be release immediately the
sum of $11.8usd (eleven million, eight hundred thousand united states
dollars has been approved in your favor via my desk. I therefore wish
to inform you that 
your payment is being processed and will be
released to you as soon as you respond to this letter.
( 1 ) Your Full Name
( 2 ) Your Corrent house Address
( 3 ) Your Phone Number:
( 4 )Your Current Occupation.......
( 5 }Your age.....
{ 6}  Your Country.......
(7). Your age.....
(8). Sex.......
(9). Your Next Of Kin Name......
(10). 
YOUR IDENTIFICATION CARD ID
.....
However, be informed that this development is real and nothing
contrary hence you cannot be disappointed because it is not a business
as usual. There is a committee set-up by the U.S government in power
to monitor this arrangement to make sure that all beneficiaries dully
receive their money and that is why your name came up for this
therefore you are assured of a good result this time.
Mr Mark Wegener
Managing Director: Sun Trust  Bank NC, U.S.A

subject: Re: Sun Trust Bank INC.
body:
Dear Mr. Wegener,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am glad to hear that there are measures being taken against fraudulent activities worldwide.

However, before proceeding further, I would like to clarify a few things:

1. Could you please provide more details about the origin of this fund? How did my name come up in relation to this sum?

2. What is the purpose of providing my card ID? I want to ensure that my personal information will be handled securely.

3. Could you please provide more details about the committee monitoring this process?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Gina
